description: Win Probability model for FCFB-Arceus based on game state and ELO ratings
calculation_steps: 1. Extract game state features (score, time, down, etc.)
3. Apply feature weights to create logit score
4. Apply sigmoid function to get probability
notes: This is a simplified approximation of the original Python XGBoost model
ELO ratings start at 1500 and update after each game
Win probability is calculated from the perspective of the team with possession
Model uses logistic regression approximation instead of full XGBoost for performance
